name: cuddle and conquer
description:
game made for the virtual pet game  jam.

use spacebar to go to next text page.

too much fatigue make things longer .

use sleep to lower fatigue.

too low food make training ineficient.

eat to regain food.

trainig gives you extra power and health for battle based on the training multiplicator.

training multiplicator is raised by peting doggo.

during fights:

-space to jump,

-left mouse click to bark;

-b to unleash the super bark;

https://github.com/jromagna42/cuddle_and_conquier
